name: Kantolan KunnonSali
alt: A screenshot of Kantolan KunnonSali's website. The frontpage includes a dark theme with blue accent colors.
description: A local gym in Hämeenlinna. Summer 2022 I worked with a classmate of mine on reworking this gym’s website all together. The end product was satisfactory and now it is a lot easier to read and use than it’s previous version. We also included a backend system for the gym’s owner to easily change the schedules on the website

name: Business Card
alt: A business card with a high contrast SK-logo on the front and a QR-code on the back. Resembling the calling cards from Persona 5.
description: A business card that I designed for myself. I wanted to make sure that it was striking and memorable. The card draws heavy inspiration from the Persona 5 game, where calling cards were a big part of the story.

name: He-Ti Huolto
alt: A screenshot of He-Ti Huolto's website.
description: A website for a business based in Hämeenlinna. The website was part of a two-in-one project, where I also made the logo for the business.

name: Miia Raussi
alt: A screenshot of the frontpage of Miia Raussi's website.
description: A website for my mother, who is pursuing a career in casting. I wanted to make the website as personable as possible and make it feel like her website.

name: Joat Rakennus Oy
alt: A screenshot of Joat Rakennus Oy's website.
description: A website for a construction company based in Hämeenlinna. The website was my first actual project for a client and I learned a lot from it. The website was built using HTML/CSS, Javascript and Bootstrap

name: Korpilahden Kesäralli 2021
alt: A poster for Korpilahden Kesäralli 2021. The poster includes a the iconic bridge of Korpilahti and a rally car jumping at the front.
description: A poster and a logo for a local rally event in Korpilahti. They wanted to include the iconic bridge of the area in the logo and the end result was very well received.
